name: Women's History Month Escape Room by Evelyn Meador Library
name_original: Women's History Month Escape Room by Evelyn Meador Library
description:
You wake up locked in a room, with no memory of how you got there....

A fully text-based Escape Room, brought to you by the Evelyn Meador Branch Library, part of the Harris County Library System. Visit us at hcpl.net for more programs and services!
